::Magmatron::

    He saw Cheetor run through the door and down the hall.
    "Computer, close all exits." Magmatron said. He then went to his computer 
room. He sat down and started looking for signs of Cheetor. Once he found him 
he sealed the hallway so he couldn't escape. He then touched his face.
    "Bad Kitty," He said over the comm. "Now listen, I am not a bad guy, I 
would like you to help me. I actullay like the Maximals, so I would do 
nothing to destroy them. I only wish to talk to you, so please sit down and I 
will be there in a second."

______________________________________________________________________
::CyberShark::

    Carring Pantron on his back he zoomed to the Destron base. When he got 
there he looked down at Pantron's face, it was almost completly destroyed. He 
needed a lot of time in a CR chamber. But the doors were sealed to the Base.
    "What the--" CyberShark asked himself. "There must be an emergency 
inside. Magmatron it's me, CyberShark. I have Pantron here and he needs time 
in the CR chamber, he's almost blown to scrap."
    The doors opened and CyberShark transformed and ran in. He ran past 
everythin untill he reached the CR room. Putting Pantron in there he slammed 
the door shut and started it up. It quickly assesed the damage, his Spark was 
fading, he was going to die.
    CyberShark opened the door and opened his Spark Container, what he was 
about to do was nearly impissible to do, he needed to remove his spark. 
Finally he found something to put it in, it was crude and wouldn't last 
forever, but it would work. Putting the Spark in the container, he started 
repairs on Pantron's body.
